metadata.title: CVE-2015-8685 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM3.8.3 and earlier allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via the (1) external calendar url or (2) the bank name field in the"import external calendar" page.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
